snippet.title: Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke Steam Announcement Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke is a top down action shooter with randomly generated loot, levels, and enemies. Find unique weapons and upgrades to blast, explode, laser, and kick your way through an army of dastardly bandits!

Wishlist on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1487240/Romanticized_Dreams_of_a_PostApocalyptic_Cowpoke/

Studio Website:
https://apexwolfstudios.com/
